org.spongepowered.api.entity.living

Interface ArmorStand

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ArmorEquipable, Carrier, DataHolder, Entity, EntityState, Equipable, Identifiable, Living

    public interface ArmorStand
extends Living, ArmorEquipable
    Represents an armor stand.

      • doesShowArms

        boolean doesShowArms()
        Returns whether this armor stand shows arms or not.

        Arms that do not show may also not show an item in hand.

        Returns:
        Whether this armor stand shows its arms
